solution_steps.calculation: Recognize sum/difference of cubes or factorable form
Use a³±b³ formula or factor theorem

hints.text: Check if expression is a sum or difference of cubes
Use formula: a³+b³=(a+b)(a²-ab+b²) or a³-b³=(a-b)(a²+ab+b²)
Apply factor theorem if needed to find rational roots
